SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="1cfc494643a447d781ad1ca0058ee268" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Rescue Corps?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Is there someone who
needs rescuing?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1cfc494643a447d781ad1ca0058ee268" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]I don't recall seeing anything.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1cfc494643a447d781ad1ca0058ee268" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]I'm what?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'm a castaway?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1cfc494643a447d781ad1ca0058ee268" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly"/]Huh?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I was so busy looking around at the
flora here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I had no idea.
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Intro_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="82f09de74abf45079371d3c4ebcfc334" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]According to [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Olimar"/]Olimar[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s log,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] an "Onion,"[etc:Wait frame="8"/] as
they're called,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] will fuse with Onions of
other colors.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="82f09de74abf45079371d3c4ebcfc334" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YesFaceOnly"/]Extraordinary![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="82f09de74abf45079371d3c4ebcfc334" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]For the sake of my research,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]if you fuse
any Onions,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] please let me know[System:Color name="Default"].
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="9d7fe8f729ce401595f90bfadf37be49" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Are you an organism created from a
biocrafter,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] like me?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's an organic
factory that creates other life.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9d7fe8f729ce401595f90bfadf37be49" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]No,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I don't suppose you would be.
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="fa64bad5b2944970ac5b0cab8da9013a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]You're quite the rare breed.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] How did the
Rescue Corps end up with a dog like you?
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="a20e1b1ba7e948cc85c2d4d2612af9eb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]I am deeply interested in your lineage.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
You simply have to let me research you![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a20e1b1ba7e948cc85c2d4d2612af9eb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]What?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It's out of the question because
you're on duty?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That's a shame.
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="edaee75f98f845f2aedb95e5b18854a4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Fact:[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the Onion has fused,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] acquiring a
notable degree of color from the ones it
fused with.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="edaee75f98f845f2aedb95e5b18854a4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Hmm.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It seems to have matured splendidly
as well.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] This may be as far as an Onion's
development goes.
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Quest_Clear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="31ff6b02a86a4819b2ea77df513673f1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]With your assistance,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've obtained some
invaluable research data.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Thank you!
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="1025dc3baa414f75a70e7b1ca86f7c65" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Oh,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's you again.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] This is fascinating![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I was
able to confirm that the Onion has fused.
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Quest_ChildClear02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="37011c2560704a0fb74c27cba41a3639" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Please keep collecting different colors of
Onions.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I've got a lot more research to do.
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearA0:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="14e40240dc264a6b862e73ea93865a74" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitSurprise"/]How unexpected.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] This Onion has already
been fused to a significant degree.

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="345be1f5641b46e4bfefb0b4775a9066" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]This is worth examining in greater detail.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Now,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] where should I start?
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Quest_OrderAndClearB0: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="6e461a7b9ae749d3a6c4169f0d57f3b3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]What?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You already made the Onion fuse?

[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="e6a4d442fed6454c992a4b16973af04c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]If you'll allow me a moment of selfishness,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I had hoped to see the Onion prior to
fusing.
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="286e1a4e53b6449c88f9cf18b1a9a9ca" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Did you want to ask me something about
my research?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="286e1a4e53b6449c88f9cf18b1a9a9ca" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]No?[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Then what could you possibly need?
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="14a0756641624241abf98eddc7d152f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]There's a member of the task force I often
discuss science with.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You may have met
him.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] The environmental ecologist, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal13"/]Sy[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="14a0756641624241abf98eddc7d152f3" Scale="1"/]He entered university at a very young age.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Quite an impressive individual.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="14a0756641624241abf98eddc7d152f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]He's also the youngest member of the
research task force.
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="623a30a42a28481f87340cfb1ce5d5eb" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]The Onion is...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]a truly fascinating organism.
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="b3a56ee1f50f494bade64c283ee50d08" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Ah![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You must want to ask about my
research.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Good,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] very good.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b3a56ee1f50f494bade64c283ee50d08" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I'm currently working on my hypothesis
that the Onion is a biocrafter.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b3a56ee1f50f494bade64c283ee50d08" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]The Onion is a biocrafter intentionally
created to ensure the propagation and
safety of the Pikmin,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] is it not?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b3a56ee1f50f494bade64c283ee50d08" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]To verify this theory,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I have dedicated
myself to studying the Onion.
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="53ba268c3c3b4ae79bb84068c6c33e42" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Do you think my hypothesis that the Onion
is a biocrafter is pretty wild?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="53ba268c3c3b4ae79bb84068c6c33e42" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]If you'll humor me for a moment,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let's
consider it together.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="53ba268c3c3b4ae79bb84068c6c33e42" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Its symbiotic relationship with Pikmin
doesn't appear coincidental.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Durability and
flight capability allow it to travel far.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="53ba268c3c3b4ae79bb84068c6c33e42" Scale="1"/]Its ejections and production adjustments
of Pikmin seem calculated.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] All mechanics
that fit the idea of intentional "crafting."
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="70e75dba0edd423ea294e5cf9f0f7f24" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]To Pikmin,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the Onion is—to put it in terms
of our understanding of biology—similar to
the concept of a nest.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="70e75dba0edd423ea294e5cf9f0f7f24" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]But the fact that the Pikmin themselves
are crafted by it far exceeds the function
of a nest as we understand it.
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="60988d61c068462381bcea9449f5b2cc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]An Onion can craft different Pikmin based
on what other Onions it has fused with.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="60988d61c068462381bcea9449f5b2cc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]If we consider these blueprints for new
Pikmin,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it behaves like a crafter,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="f882089efe174ded9b84cc4de20c00c6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I joined the research task force so that I
could compare and contrast the ways
life has developed on different planets.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f882089efe174ded9b84cc4de20c00c6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]By doing so,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I thought I might gain a
deeper understanding of the evolution
of life on my own planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f882089efe174ded9b84cc4de20c00c6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]In practice,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] however,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it seems that life on
this planet is very different from my own.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Something I find extremely fascinating.
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="ccd911b291834d37b33b236bdeafc377" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Ah![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You must want to ask about my
research.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Good,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] very good.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ccd911b291834d37b33b236bdeafc377" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I'm currently working on my hypothesis
that the Onion is a biocrafter.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ccd911b291834d37b33b236bdeafc377" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]The Onion is a biocrafter intentionally
created to ensure the propagation and
safety of the Pikmin,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] is it not?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ccd911b291834d37b33b236bdeafc377" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]To verify this theory,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I have dedicated
myself to studying the Onion.
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="67e2eed3e88948d088aa6eee682d2e5e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Do you think my hypothesis that the Onion
is a biocrafter is pretty wild?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="67e2eed3e88948d088aa6eee682d2e5e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]If you'll humor me for a moment,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let's
consider it together.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="67e2eed3e88948d088aa6eee682d2e5e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Its symbiotic relationship with Pikmin
doesn't appear coincidental.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Durability and
flight capability allow it to travel far.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="67e2eed3e88948d088aa6eee682d2e5e" Scale="1"/]Its ejections and production adjustments
of Pikmin seem calculated.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] All mechanics
that fit the idea of intentional "crafting."
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="510c045a63f041fda09077eef5f3192b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]A moment, please.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I must concentrate on
observing the Onion.
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="5838c90f8aeb4bda859898c251c4fcbe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]To Pikmin,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] the Onion is—to put it in terms
of our understanding of biology—similar to
the concept of a nest.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5838c90f8aeb4bda859898c251c4fcbe" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]But the fact that the Pikmin themselves
are crafted by it far exceeds the function
of a nest as we understand it.
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_05_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="2727c06c71c348d3bb640a1f3ea3602f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'm quite eager to learn more about the
environmental pressures that caused life
here to evolve into its current forms.
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_06_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="362515fe66ce49f1b95301cbc70e60ec" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]An Onion can craft different Pikmin based
on what other Onions it has fused with.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="362515fe66ce49f1b95301cbc70e60ec" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]If we consider these blueprints for new
Pikmin,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it behaves like a crafter,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] right?
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_07_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="0b373169b04c4928aee89c78cd2e3d3d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I joined the research task force so that I
could compare and contrast the ways
life has developed on different planets.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0b373169b04c4928aee89c78cd2e3d3d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]By doing so,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I thought I might gain a
deeper understanding of the evolution
of life on my own planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0b373169b04c4928aee89c78cd2e3d3d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]In practice,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] however,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it seems that life on
this planet is very different from my own.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Something I find extremely fascinating.
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Guide_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="dc34f0a03e944a778b875b9c4edc8c22" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]No luck finding an Onion for some of the
remaining Pikmin you have with you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] huh?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="dc34f0a03e944a778b875b9c4edc8c22" Scale="1"/]I wonder...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="dc34f0a03e944a778b875b9c4edc8c22" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Might there be some hidden locations that
we've overlooked somewhere?
SV009.SV009_Area500_Talk_Guide_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal09"/][UE:Meta key="acacf8425a6549189749ed8aba15ea7a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]This is simply unbelievable.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="acacf8425a6549189749ed8aba15ea7a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="SadFaceOnly"/]A white leafling appeared recently in one
of my dreams.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="acacf8425a6549189749ed8aba15ea7a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]They told me I would find an Onion nearby
of a color I'd never seen before.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="acacf8425a6549189749ed8aba15ea7a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Actually,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] forget I mentioned it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I've
probably been spending too much
time with Onions on the brain.
